InstanceArn.description: The ARN of the AWS SSO instance under which the operation will be executed.
InstanceArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the AWS SSO instance under which the operation will be executed.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 10  
Maximum Length: 1224  
Pattern: arn:(aws|aws-us-gov|aws-cn|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):sso:::instance/(sso)?ins-[a-zA-Z0-9-.]{16}  
Update requires: Replacement

InstanceAccessControlAttributeConfigurat.description: The InstanceAccessControlAttributeConfiguration property has been deprecated but is still supported for backwards compatibility purposes. We recomend that you use  AccessControlAttributes property instead.
